articleinfo.title: How to Configure Apache for SSO

section.title: Install Shibboleth SP Package
section.para: The Shibboleth Service Provider (SP) software runs as a system service, and is configured via an apache module. For Centos, add shib.repo to /etc/yum/repos.d and install with yum:
For other systems, follow the instructions on the Shibboleth SP Installation page:

section.title: Copy Files From Archive
section.note: IDP and SP metadata filenames are unique for each idp and sp. The SP metadata is based on the i-number for the trust relationship. The IDP metadata is based on the i-number for the organization.

section.title: Add Server Certificate to Metadata
section.para: Update server-cert in shibboleth2.xml at following location:
section.programlisting: <ds:X509Certificate> ********************************* Insert pem format of the key here ********************************* </ds:X509Certificate>

section.title: Update hostnames and ports in config files
section.para: Edit hostname in secure session section in shiiboleth2.xml file
section.note: Hostname and port should match Apache's ServerName and Port directives
section.para: Edit httpd.conf file to set UseCanonicalName On:

section.title: Protect Folder with Shibboleth SSO
section.para: Add following to httpd.conf file to protect directories
section.programlisting: <Directory "path to directories"> AuthType shibboleth ShibRequestSetting requireSession 1 ShibUseHeaders On require valid-user </Directory>
